sentences.en: Bob Dole seemed less than enthusiastic about the proposed move.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃·多尔似乎对提议的这项行动不太感兴趣。

sentences.en: Consumer advocacy groups are not so enthusiastic about removing restrictions on the telephone companies.
sentences.cn: 保护消费者团体并不热衷于取消对电话公司的限制。

sentences.en: He drew reassurance from the enthusiastic applause.
sentences.cn: 热烈的掌声使他获得了信心.

sentences.en: Her greeting was less than enthusiastic.
sentences.cn: 她的问候一点都不热情。

sentences.en: Here the crowd was thickest and most enthusiastic.
sentences.cn: 这里的人群最密集,热情也最高.

sentences.en: His works won the enthusiastic approval of his readers.
sentences.cn: 他的作品受到读者的赞许.

sentences.en: I gathered from the way she replied that she wasn't very enthusiastic.
sentences.cn: 从她回答的语气判断,我觉得她不很热心.

sentences.en: Romeo left the stage, to enthusiastic applause.
sentences.cn: 罗密欧在热烈的掌声中离开了舞台。
她非常爱好打高尔夫球.

sentences.en: She's very enthusiastic to read a novel.
The teachers are enthusiastic and have a sense of purpose.
sentences.cn: 教师们很热情并且很有决心。

sentences.en: They acknowledged the enthusiastic plaudits of the crowd.
sentences.cn: 他们对人群中爆发的热烈喝采答礼.

sentences.en: You don't sound very enthusiastic about the idea.
sentences.cn: 你好像对这个想法不太感兴趣。

words.tran_cn: 热心（过去式enthused，过去分词enthused，现在分词enthusing，第三人称单数enthuses）

trans.tran_en: feeling or showing a lot of interest and excitement about something
